projects.title: NeoDuke
projects.description: A collection of emojis based on the Neocat pack.
projects.alt: The main NeoDuke emoji. a flat styled Java Duke.

projects.title: Mini Badges
projects.description: A collection of different project badges that follow the user's dark mode preference.
projects.alt: A logo styled to look like a mini-badge

projects.title: Bootloader Unlock: Wall of Shame
projects.description: A wiki on how (or how not) to unlock your device's bootloader.
projects.alt: A lock emoji next to the key emoji on fire. The background is fire.

projects.title: Andromeda
projects.description: A modular, multi-purpose, highly configurable tweaks mod.
projects.alt: A galaxy on a purple hexagon background.

projects.title: Commander
projects.description: An extension of the data pack system. Introduces a new JSON event system, new commands, and advanced expressions.
projects.alt: 3 gears on a command block-colored background

projects.description: A modular Minecraft library. (A bit of a mess)
